org.fluentjdbc.DbContextTable

Packages that use DbContextTable
Package
Description
org.fluentjdbc
Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

    Creates a DbContextTable associated with this DbContext.

    Associate a custom implementation of DatabaseTable with this DbContext
    DbContextTable
    DbContext.tableWithTimestamps(String tableName)
    Creates a DbContext.table(String) which automatically updates created_at and updated_at columns in the underlying database.
